name: Aethervation
description:
Entry for Finnish College Jam #4

An aetherpunk escape room game.

Controls: WASD for movement

Mouse1 for dragging objects

Whoops! You accidentaly blew up the building. Now you have to escape this flaming hot facility and move objects out of your way with your special power!

Aetherwizards behind the game:

Tuukka Aalto, game design, coding, art design

Heli Jakku-Jonsson, game design, core idea

Mikko Sormunen, music, sound design
